title: Loblaws up the street had better sanitary precautions than we did at Toronto Public Health
description: Insiders describe a shoulder to shoulder training session on March   in downtown Toronto with no masks  active screening  sanitizer or social distancing
content: Picture this  Its Friday  March    The Toronto Public Health war room in downtown Toronto  Forty public health nurses jammed shoulder to shoulder in one room for the day being trained on how to track the outbreak of COVID    No masks  no hand washing proto    chars
